body: <white>The shrunken head in your inventory sneezes violently.
<white>You cry aloud your rejection of divine grace, and leave the protection of the Divinities.
<white>You are already twisting your body to avoid blows.
<white>Your input, 'spacing on' is not a valid command. Type HELP BASECOMMANDS for a list of common commands.
<white>Your input, 'weave aurora' is not a valid command. Type HELP BASECOMMANDS for a list of common commands.
<white>You are already wielding your weapons with finesse.
<white>You have already filled your mind with clarity.
<#e5e5e5>You touch the firefly tattoo and suddenly your surroundings are alight.
<white>The filtered light through the branches above you becomes dark for a moment as a large cloud passes overhead.
<#cdcd00><#0000ee>A shadowy haze absorbs light here, emanating through and around a singularity. <#00cdcd>A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. <white>

<white>RExits<#cd00cd>You see exits leading COLOR #800080SEND HREF="north"north/SEND/COLOR, COLOR #800080SEND HREF="south"south/SEND/COLOR COLOR #800080SEND HREF="close door south"(open mahogany door)/SEND/COLOR, and COLOR #800080SEND HREF="west"west/SEND/COLOR./RExits
<white>The shrunken head in your inventory sneezes violently.
<#cdcd00><#0000ee>A shadowy haze absorbs light here, emanating through and around a singularity. <#00cdcd>A promising chunk of stone has been unearthed and left here. <white>

<white>RExits<#cd00cd>You see exits leading COLOR #800080SEND HREF="east"east/SEND/COLOR, COLOR #800080SEND HREF="northeast"northeast/SEND/COLOR, COLOR #800080SEND HREF="northwest"northwest/SEND/COLOR, and COLOR #800080SEND HREF="southwest"southwest/SEND/COLOR./RExits
<#cdcd00><#0000ee>A shadowy haze absorbs light here, emanating through and around a singularity. <#00cdcd>A promising chunk of stone has been unearthed and left here. <white>
<white>RExits<#cd00cd>You see exits leading COLOR #800080SEND HREF="southeast"southeast/SEND/COLOR and COLOR #800080SEND HREF="up"up/SEND/COLOR./RExits
<#cdcd00><#0000ee>A shadowy haze absorbs light here, emanating through and around a singularity. <white>
<white>RExits<#cd00cd>You see exits leading COLOR #800080SEND HREF="down"down/SEND/COLOR and COLOR #800080SEND HREF="south"south/SEND/COLOR./RExits
<white>You can find no such target as 'boube'.
<white>You can find no such target as 'boube'.

<#cdcd00><#0000ee>A shadowy haze absorbs light here, emanating through and around a singularity. <#00cdcd>A bright green cucumber is here. <white>Impish in size but lacking in any shades but black, an inky shadeling bounces about here. <#00ffff>Boube is here. He wields a miniature blackthorn staff in his left hand and a small copper buckler painted with a dragon in his right. He is orbited by an eye sigil, an eye sigil, and an eye sigil. <#7f7f7f>A supermassive singularity warps reality around itself.
<#7f7f7f><#cd00cd>A glyph of addling hangs in the air.
<#cd00cd>RExitsYou see exits leading COLOR #800080SEND HREF="down"down/SEND/COLOR and COLOR #800080SEND HREF="north"north/SEND/COLOR./RExits
<#cd00cd>Sizzling and crackling, an addling glyph flares, sending a mote of power to surround you with a fogging miasma.
<#cd00cd>Your clarity of mind has been corrupted.
<white>Its magic depleted, the addling glyph shatters.
<#e5e5e5>You send an iron-tipped whip to flay Boube, lashing out with the tip.
<#e5e5e5>He seems to jolt as the fangbarrier defence is flayed from him.
<#e5e5e5>You discern that a layer of voyria has rubbed off your weapon.
<white>When you can act: shadow mark fatigue Boube
<white>Boube applies some hardening paste to himself.
<white>Boube takes a drink from an amethyst vial.
<white>Boube seems to calm, no longer poisoned.
<white>You take a long drag off your pipe filled with reishi.
<#e5e5e5>The lines ensnaring the eye, Boube traces a glyph of entrapment in the air.
<white>You have recovered balance on all limbs.
<#e5e5e5>You weave a dampening net over the mind of Boube.
<#e5e5e5>Like the growing echo of humming crystal, Boube imbues you with a reverberating curse, attuned to the weight and cold of his shadows.
<#e5e5e5>Paying the shadowprice in exchange for speed, Boube quickly sends his shadows to curse you with the weight of their whispering gloom.
<#e5e5e5>Boube's health weakens as he repays his debt to Shadow.
<#e5e5e5>Boube uses Sciomancy Shadowprice Ruin on you.

<#e5e5e5>The element gathering and roiling at Boube's command, he lashes at you with insatiable darkness, willing the corrosive voracity to ruin the fabric of your being with greater fervor as he pays the shadowprice.
<#e5e5e5>The consuming ruin afflicts you with clumsiness.
<white>The consuming ruin afflicts you with weariness.
<white>First Aid will no longer utilize the focusing ability in its curing.
<white>Thank the Gods! Your clumsiness has been cured.
<white>You press an epidermal poultice against your head, rubbing it into your flesh.
<white>You take a drink of an elixir of health from a Wheel of Fates vial.
<white>You remove 1 decongestant, bringing the total in the cache to 1453.
<white>You touch the tree of life tattoo.
<white>Your limbs strengthen and you feel stronger.
<white>Biting, unnatural shadow washes over you in a blinding wave, assaulting your senses.
<white>Your gravity increases as the singularity weighs down upon you.
<white>Creeping in your breath and whispering through your head, the hunger of the singularity corrupts you.
<white>You cannot contain the convulsions in your stomach any longer and double over, retching violently.
<white>You suddenly perceive the vague outline of an aura of rebounding around Boube.
<white>You are again able to absorb a poultice.
<white>You press an epidermal poultice against your head, rubbing it into your flesh.
<white><#ffff00>>>> <white>qeb stand;;parry head;;bedazzle Boube;;hypnotise Boube;;suggest Boube Hypochondria
<white>When you can act: stand;;parry head;;bedazzle Boube;;hypnotise Boube;;suggest Boube Hypochondria
<white>You may influence the shadows once more.
<white>You have recovered balance on all limbs.
<white>You will now attempt to parry attacks to your head.
<#e5e5e5>You sprinkle some silvery powder over Boube and grin widely as he looks about with a look of slight bafflement on his face.
<white>You fix Boube with an entrancing stare, and smile in satisfaction as you realise that his mind is yours.
<white>You issue the suggestion, concealing it deep within Boube's mind.
<white><#ffff00>>>> <white>qeb stand;;parry head;;bedazzle Boube;;hypnotise Boube;;suggest Boube Hypochondria;;shadow sleight void Boube
<white>When you can act: stand;;parry head;;bedazzle Boube;;hypnotise Boube;;suggest Boube Hypochondria;;shadow sleight void Boube
<white>Boube takes a long drag off his pipe filled with reishi.
<white>A look of extreme focus crosses the face of Boube.
<#e5e5e5>You become transfixed as Boube warps the ambient elements in a mesmerizing display of colour and light.
<white>You begin trying to wrest your mind free of that which has transfixed it.
<white>You are again able to absorb a poultice.
<white>First Aid will now utilize the focusing ability in its curing.
<white>You feel an aura of rebounding surround you.
<white><#ffff00>>>> <white>qeb stand;;bite Boube scytherus;;suggest Boube Impatience;;shadow sleight void Boube
<white>When you can act: stand;;bite Boube scytherus;;suggest Boube Impatience;;shadow sleight void Boube
<white>A thick, hardened shell of paste has formed around Boube.
<white><#ffff00>>>> <white>qeb stand;;dstab Boube curare vernalius;;suggest Boube Impatience;;shadow sleight void Boube
<white>When you can act: stand;;dstab Boube curare vernalius;;suggest Boube Impatience;;shadow sleight void Boube
<white>An inky shadeling reaches out with a shadowy appendage, stealing the warmth from your flesh.
<white>Your insulation has been frozen stiff by the cold.
<white>Your eyes dim as you lose your sight.
<white>You press a caloric poultice against your skin, rubbing it into your flesh.
<white>A feeling of comfortable warmth spreads over you.

<#e5e5e5>Threads of shadow begin to weave around you, zig-zagging across your vision and diffusing outward, blurring and freying into a cage that becomes increasingly more opaque. Soon, Boube has engulfed you in a shadowsphere, the vibrancy of the world fading to something horrific and dark, playing tricks within your mind - has the world lost its colour, or only your eyes? The darkness becomes more palpable and sinks into your skin, an eternity of the void, pressing in around you and forcing your senses to lash out with intense nyctophobia.
<white>You continue trying to wrest your mind free.
<white>You focus your mind intently on curing your mental maladies.
<white>What's so scary about the dark anyway?
<white>You take a drink of an elixir of health from a Wheel of Fates vial.
<white>You are again able to absorb a poultice.
<white>You have recovered balance on all limbs.
<white>You are transfixed and cannot do that. You must writhe to escape.
<white>You issue the suggestion, concealing it deep within Boube's mind.
<white>You are transfixed and cannot do that. You must writhe to escape.
<white>You take a long drag off your pipe filled with reishi.
<#e5e5e5>Like the growing echo of humming crystal, Boube imbues you with a reverberating curse, attuned to the weight and cold of his shadows.
<#e5e5e5>Paying the shadowprice in exchange for speed, Boube quickly sends his shadows to curse you with the weight of their whispering gloom.
<#e5e5e5>Shadowprice fueling the decay, Boube encourages his infecting shadows to bloom and fester within you into shaderot.
<white>You press an epidermal poultice against your head, rubbing it into your flesh.
<white>You infuse an inscribed bandage with 100 doses of an epidermal poultice from your fluidcache.
<white><#ff0000>You have 4865 sips remaining in your fluidcache.
<#ff0000><white>You have writhed free of your state of transfixion.
<white>First Aid will no longer utilize the focusing ability in its curing.

<white>You remove 1 amaurosis, bringing the total in the cache to 1511.

<white>You envenom your weapon with curare and vernalius.
<#e5e5e5>Lunging in, you stick Boube with a needle-pointed dirk.
<#e5e5e5>You discern that a layer of curare has rubbed off your weapon.
<#e5e5e5>Boube frowns as he struggles with numbed motion.
<#e5e5e5>Deftly twirling the weapon in your hand, you jab him with it once more.
<#e5e5e5>You discern that a layer of vernalius has rubbed off your weapon.
<white>You issue the suggestion, concealing it deep within Boube's mind.
